title: Stock Futures Slip Ahead of Jobs Report
sub_head: Economists expect that U.S. employers likely added jobs at a healthy clip in May
body:
U.S. stock futures edged lower ahead of Mayâ€™s jobs report, which will give insight into the state of the labor market and likely steer central bank policy.
Futures for the S&P 500 slipped 0.3% Friday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 fell 0.6% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged down 0.2%.
